ascend_skill.desc:
Grant 1 Power of Friendship stack to allies when their HP falls 75% or less. This can stack up to 2 times.
When allies have Power of Friendship, increase Attack by 6% of Kamiyama's Attack (up to 120/180/240, increasing at Lv. 1/50/70) for 1 turn.
ascend_skill.name: Hyper Hero Time!

ascend_skill.desc: Increase allies' Defense by 10% when they have Power of Friendship.
ascend_skill.name: Intense Link

ascend_skill.desc: After using skills on allies, increase own Attack by 25%.
ascend_skill.name: Undying Justice

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Atomic Smash and Justice Barrier by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Serious Action

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase target's critical damage by 25% for 2 turns.
ascend_skill.name: Hero's Journey Home

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Ultima Booster and Thief Tactics by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Self-Discipline

ascend_skill.desc: When using a skill on an ally with HP below 60%, increase critical damage by 25% for 1 turn.
ascend_skill.name: Turning the Tables

highlight_skill.desc: Grant the maximum number of Power of Friendship stacks to 1 ally (other than Kamiyama) for 2 turns. If the target's remaining HP is below 60%, restore their HP up to 60% (healing is limited to 200% of Kamiyama's Attack). Increase Attack by 15% of Kamiyama's Attack (up to 585.6/645.6/609.6/669.6) for 2 turns.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 170.8%/188.3%/177.8%/195.3% of Attack. For each stack of Power of Friendship the party has, increase damage by 10%.
normal_skill.name: Atomic Smash

normal_skill.desc:
Spend 30% of 1 other ally's remaining HP to grant them a shield equal to 80% of HP spent + 31.6%/31.6%/32.9%/32.9% of Kamiyama's Attack + 900/1095/1035/1230 for 2 turns.
Also grant 1 Power of Friendship stack.
normal_skill.name: Justice Barrier

normal_skill.desc:
Increase 1 ally's Attack by 19.5%/19.5%/20.3%/20.3% for 2 turns (other than Kamiyama).
For each stack of Power of Friendship the target has, increase Attack by 20% of Kamiyama's Attack more (up to 1516.7/1672.1/1578.9/1734.3).
normal_skill.name: Ultima Booster

passive_skill.desc: When Justice Barrier ends, restore HP equal to 100.0% of remaining shield.
passive_skill.name: Energy Recharge

passive_skill.desc: Increase allies' critical damage by 45.0% when they have 2 Power of Friendship stacks.
passive_skill.name: Full Power: Start!
